summary: Set a few days after the original, a championship basketball team's bus is attacked by The Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror, on the last day of his 23-day feeding frenzy.
cast: Ray Wise|Jonathan Breck|Garikayi Mutambirwa|Eric Nenninger|Nicki Aycox|Travis Schiffner|Lena Cardwell|Billy Aaron Brown|Marieh Delfino|Diane Delano|Thom Gossom Jr.|Tom Tarantini|Al Santos|Josh Hammond|Kasan Butcher|Drew Tyler Bell|Luke Edwards|Shaun Fleming|Justin Long|Bob Papenbrook|Jon Powell|Marshall Cook|Joe Reegan|Stephanie Denise Griffin|Nick George|Phillip Currie|Andrew Reville|Gil McKinney|David Zepeda|Julie Soper|Darren Robertson|Largo Woodruff
title: Jeepers Creepers 2
